definition: top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: It is an irrefutable law of art that there is no drama without conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 沒有衝突就沒有戲劇，這是顛撲不破的藝術規律。
這真是一個顛撲不破的實例。

sentences.english: I don't know of any alternative to the proposal that grammar is generative.
sentences.chinese: 喬氏在這裏認定，語法的生成性是顛撲不破的真理。
